name: UncommentedEmptyConstructor
summary:
Uncommented Empty Constructor finds instances where a constructor does not
contain statements, but there is no comment. By explicitly commenting empty
constructors it is easier to distinguish between intentional (commented)
and unintentional empty constructors.

configuration.name: ignoreExplicitConstructorInvocation
configuration.description: Ignore explicit constructor invocation when deciding whether constructor is empty or not
